description: Configuration settings for automated patch update maintenance for the Managed Database.

day_of_week.description: The numeric reference for the day of the week to perform maintenance. `1` is Monday, `2` is Tuesday, through to `7` which is Sunday.

duration.description: The maximum maintenance window time in hours.

frequency.description: How frequently maintenance occurs. Currently can only be `weekly`.

hour_of_day.description: The hour to begin maintenance based in UTC time.

deadline.description: The time when a mandatory update needs to be applied.

planned_for.description: The date and time a maintenance update will be applied.
